ygData.subject: Re: Human Shadow Knight Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I am pretty dissapointed with the shadowknight quests also, ive tried a few freeport ones, return the note to lucan or return to dismal rage...very little
ygData.messageBody:
I am pretty dissapointed with the shadowknight quests also, ive tried a few
freeport ones, return the note to lucan or return to dismal rage...very
little reward there and barely any exp...

ive tried to kill groflah steadirt twice, once at level 24 once at level
35...the first time i had help the second time i killed him myself. But both
times his corpse dissapears with no note! I complained to a GM that this
happened twice and my faction was going to hell with freeport merchants the
gm replied -
"that merchants corpses dissapear to discourage players from killing them,
and to send a email to questhelp@... with details about the broken
quest" So, i sent my email and pretty much gave up on that one...

Im currently trying to find the freeport guard traitor who works for the
knights of truth, anyone know who it is? I sure do wish there was some high
level SK quests like the paladins soulfire quest....im a level 40 human SK
and have no real rewarding quests i can do....

-Rufane darkmire of the stormravens-
tunare

Countess Bathory D'Allatu wrote:

> From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
> So far these are the quests ive done and what i
> received for them. All in Qeynos
>
> Kill Drosco: Sometimes a spell, little cash and Trumpy
> Quest
>
> Trumpy: Kill him, bring in his Head. Little cash and
> his skull back for next quest.
> This ticks me off because if youre a goodie you can
> kill him bring in his head and get the BloodForge
> Hammer.
>
> Trumpy's Skull: Bring it to Grimrot so it can be
> reanimated. Some cash, nice XP for my level at the
> time. 2 of us got nothing else, 2 got minor items.
> Onyx and raw hide cloak.
>
> All that work and we received squat. VERY
> disappointing.
>
> Kill Milea Clothspinner: brought back her cloth. got
> little cash and a rusty mace and a low level cleric
> spell. no new quest.
> Again VERY disappointing. Here i was level 10 or
> under, walking thru East Karana and taking on Milea
> who was red. (i did have help, but thats not the
> point) And i get a rusty mace.
>
> Kill Paladins and turn in their Amulets or prayer
> beads. I couldnt get this one to work for the life of
> me. But others have and they say the payoff was
> nothing.
>
> Kill Arlena for Grimrot: this is in Mistmoore. Im only
> level 25 so thats out of my reach still.
>
> Here's my question:
>
> Has anyone done these quests recently or any of the
> Freeport quests and gotten anything worthwhile.
> The Trolls now have a couple good ones, and the
> goodies can kill the same target and get weapons that
> can sell for 100Pp.
> What do the Human Sks get now?
>
> Have any of these Qeynos quests been upgraded or any
> added since ive been there? Are the Freeport quests,
> Steadirt in particualr, working?
>
> Thanks
>
> Bathory D'Allatu
> Minions of Darkness
> Cazic-Thule
>
